2050670.name: Time Tribunal
2050670.description:
Have you ever heard of the space-time continuum? And have you ever had the luck (or misfortune) to be alone with the laws of time? Two completely ordinary teenagers got into an unequal deadly battle of a mysterious pioneer camp, where every situation is like a shot, and a word is a projectile.
Waiting for you:

• More than 5 hours of non-stop narration, where you will get involved in the most real intrigues;

• Discover 11 endings by learning the consequences of your fateful decisions;

• More than 40 art;

• Interesting story and karma system.

• Discuss:

Participate in court proceedings and try to solve the mysteries of the murder of your squadmates.

• Refute:

Refute the false statements of your squadmates in order to figure out the killer among your comrades.

• Agree:

Agree with the conclusions that you consider correct, so that together with your friends you can uncover the secrets of the Tribunal of Time.

And then you will find out only in the game itself. Forward and with a song, pioneer!

(The game is in development)

Attention! The game has a checkmate and black humor!
Attention! The game is in development!
2050670.supported_languages:
俄语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
